sections.description: Flower Shop: Florist is a responsive and powerful WordPress theme that is fully integrated with the WooCommerce plugin. The theme has many useful and necessary options to manage and change the entire design of the site, starting from the top bar and header sections to the footer. WordPress Flower Shop theme is WooCommerce ready, which means you can easily set up and customize your store website using our theme and WooCommerce plugin. Our theme has many WooCommerce features that allow you to have complete control over your store page design. Additionally, the theme has several nice features to enhance the functionality of your store pages. For example, you can enable the WooCommerce search bar, which will display store categories and a search form for products only. By the way, the search bar can be displayed separately on the store, product, and checkout pages. Apart from the various sections of the custom homepage, there are two beautiful WooCommerce sections. The first one allows you to display a list of the latest products, the second one allows you to add 3 well-designed sections for trending products, discounts, or any type of products you prefer. These two sections are included in the Premium version of the Flower Shop theme. Other sections on the custom homepage include calls to action, recent posts, advantages, achievements, and services. WordPress Flower Shop theme has a well-designed and unique blog page. The theme allows you to edit the design of post summaries, so you can change and style the blog as you wish. All elements on the blog/search page are customizable: banner title and background color, post summary block background color, post summary title color, meta and category colors, etc. The theme has a well-designed search overlay, top bar, different header layouts, banner animations, unique custom homepage, footer layouts and themes, and much more.  It is worth installing and checking the full functionality of the theme and seeing all the benefits of our theme.
